product_name: The North Face Farrows Twill Insulated Pants - Women's
long_description: The North Face Farrows Twill Insulated women's pants offer a slim fit, waterproof protection and insulating warmth for style and comfort when you're seeking powder stashes on the mountain. 2-layer HyVent(R) shell pants are waterproof, windproof and breathable; seams are sealed to prevent moisture from seeping through. Heatseeker(TM) polyester fiber insulation helps keep your legs warm while you're romping about in the snow; insulation packs down easily for compact stowing of pants. Chimney Venting(TM) design uses StretchVent(TM) gaiters and zippered thigh vents with mesh gussets to let you control airflow and your comfort. Rip-and-stick tabs on waistband adjust the fit. Zippered handwarmer pockets; back pockets. Reinforced cuffs resist abrasion from boots, boards and skis. The North Face Farrows Twill Insulated women's pants have a slim fit.
short_description: The North Face Farrows Twill Insulated women's pants offer a slim fit, waterproof protection and insulating warmth for style and comfort when you're seeking powder stashes on the mountain.
